error.message: Parameter $entityQuery of method Drupal\coming_soon\Controller\ComingSoonController::__construct() has typehint with deprecated class Drupal\Core\Entity\Query\QueryFactory. Deprecated in drupal:8.3.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityStorageInterface::getQuery() or \Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityStorageInterface::getAggregateQuery() instead.
Call to deprecated function drupal_set_message(). Deprecated in drupal:8.5.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Messenger\MessengerInterface::addMessage() instead.
Call to deprecated function drupal_set_message(). Deprecated in drupal:8.5.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Messenger\MessengerInterface::addMessage() instead.
Call to deprecated function file_directory_temp(). Deprecated in drupal:8.8.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\File\FileSystemInterface::getTempDirectory() instead.
Add core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 to coming_soon.info.yml to designate that the module is compatible with Drupal 9. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3070687.
